s_synopsis: Haunted by memories, you hope there is just some small oversight... some simple communications problem, but you know, deep down, in the back of your mind... They're back!!!... Face huggers, chest bursters, dog aliens, adult aliens, ruthless corporate schills, and... 3 queen aliens!!! Over 30 acid encrusted levels, an arsenal of lethal weapons, and you! All the gut-churning 3D action of the original Alien trilogy in one black-death, white-knuckle nightmare.
